title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
f <- function(x)  (x^2+x)*cos(x)
lbound <- -10; ubound <- 10
curve(f, from = lbound, to = ubound, n = 1000)
```

```{r}
library(GA)
```

```{r}
GA <- ga(type = "real-valued", fitness = f, lower = c(th = lbound), upper = ubound)
summary(GA)
```

```{r}
plot(GA)
```

```{r}
curve(f, from = lbound, to = ubound, n = 1000)
points(GA@solution, GA@fitnessValue, col = 2, pch = 19)
```
